title: Adobe AdCloud Creative Counts
description: Adobe AdCloud Counts for Creatives Belonging to a Higher Level Entity

active.title: Active Count
active.description:: Number of entities with the active status

paused.title: Paused Count
paused.description:: Number of entities with the paused status

removed.title: Removed Count
removed.description:: Number of entities with the removed status

disapproved.title: Disapproved Count
disapproved.description:: Number of entities with the disapproved status

pending.title: Pending Count
pending.description:: Number of entities with the pending status

ended.title: Ended Count
ended.description:: Number of entities with the ended status

inactive.title: Inactive Count
inactive.description:: Number of entities with the inactive status
